text: «Masagi ná-botiɠɛ nuiti ta ná-zooi zu nuɓusɛiti pɛ ti kwɛni ga tɔ gila ka ná ɛsɛ pɛ bɛ. Tɔgi naa é bosu ga nu nɔpɛ é lɛɛzu masagi ná-koi zaamaʋɛ, masagi la tolini, é ɠɛni ga zunu ɓaa anzanu, ma nui ɠa za, kɛni zɔi nii masagi a ná-zanu tukpɔi letena ma, naama nui ɠa zɛnvui a yɛ zea. Nɔ̀un gè kɛa ga folo ʋuusaʋagɔ (30), masagi la tòlisu ɠoba.»
